mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_link_stats_today (short_uri, access_date, today_pv, today_uv, today_uip, create_time, update_time, del_flag) VALUES (#{et.shortUri}, #{et.accessDate}, 1, 1, 1, #{et.createTime}, #{et.updateTime}, #{et.delFlag}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE update_time = #{et.updateTime}, today_pv = today_pv + 1, today_uv = today_uv + #{uvIncrement}, today_uip = today_uip + #{ipIncrement}
